name: Angry Delivery
description:
Submission for the Trijam #132 !
Theme : "Package delivered"

How to play :

  • Move with WASD or the arrow keys
  • Take a package by walking near it
  • Aim with the mouse and press space to throw the package you're carrying
  • Your goal is to take each package and deliver it in the correct zone
  • Score as much point as you can !

Used assets :

  • Kenney's : "Roguelike Moden City"
  • Kenney's : "Sokoban"
  • S.A.G.E : "Sound effects pack 2"

Due to the  3 hours restriction of the jam, the game misses some features, I might add them later. Things I could possibly add :

  • More obstacles
  • Cars
  • Power ups
  • Increasing difficulty
